title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB:
I see that the report design stores the absolute path for the library include. We need to save the relative path instead.

<property name="fileName" value="E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary"/>

<property name="namespace" value="lib1"/>
EB: The report design should save the relative path for the library include.
SR:
1. Open the report design.
2. Add a library include using the absolute path.
3. Save the report design.
4. Close and reopen the report design.

Expected Result: The library include should use the relative path when reopened.
